features: KEY FEATURES – Includes 10 stacking cubes that nest together for space-saving storage. The vibrant eye-catching illustrations encourage children to engage and grow their language and early learning skills. Play & Learn Stacking Cubes are a great developmental gift for both BOYS and GIRLS ages 12 months and up.

SPECS – 10 durable cardboard stacking cubes with colorful, kid-friendly illustrations. Each cube contains a side with an alphabet letter and a corresponding side with an animal or object that starts with that letter. The blocks also contain a side with a number from 1-10 and a related side with the corresponding number of animals or objects for children to count.

EDUCATIONAL BENEFITS – Introduces letters, numbers, counting, and object recognition. Creatively builds language, tactile, motor, and beginning math skills. Aligns with STEM (science, technology, engineering, and mathematics) standards. Teaches cause and effect which is an important fundamental in early learning years.

SUPPORTS DEVELOPMENTAL SKILLS - Develops hand-eye coordination. Supports language development. Strengthens bilateral coordination, balance, tactile, and fine-motor skills. Teaches spatial awareness. Builds thinking and learning skills. Supports cognitive and language development. Builds confidence and boosts self-esteem through construction play.

SAFETY & AWARDS - All Learning Journey products are regularly safety tested and are in compliance with all domestic and international toy safety regulations. Play & Learn Stacking Cubes are a 2019 HOT DIGGITY AWARD winner! Fun fact: The Learning Journey has an extensive line of Award-Winning Educational Toys that have been tested by the most important panel of judges kids!
body.description: Build them up, then knock them down! These fun Stacking Cubes are the coolest around! Learning to differentiate between size and space is critical to early learners and is an important concept for children to master. Your baby builder will remain engaged with these great stacking blocks that teach spatial awareness and counting, introduce numbers and letters, and associate related objects and animals to the corresponding sides. These ten durable cubes vary slightly in size and can be stacked into a 3-foot tall tower or nested all into one cube for convenient storage. Awaken your tiny tot’s senses and make early childhood development fun with this vibrant teaching tool! Are you looking for an interactive way to introduce letters, numbers and counting to your little one? Seeking a SAFE developmental toy with frustration-free packaging? Want a learning toy that teaches fundamental skills and offers excellent play value? Then the Play & Learn Stacking Cubes are the perfect toddler gift for your kiddo! Stacking Cubes are an excellent educational toy for both boys and girls ages 12 months and up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Play & Learn Stacking Cubes Learning to differentiate between size and space is critical to early learners and is an important concept for children to learn. The Play & Learn Stacking Cubes are a great tool to help teach spatial awareness. These ten durable cubes vary slightly in size and can be stacked into a cube tower or nested all into one cube. Each cube also features a number, letter, shape, or animal on each side of the five panels. Ages 1-3 years.

Features & Benefits Over 3 Feet of Stacking Fun! Children can engage in hands-on learning with Stacking Cubes! Made of durable, but lightweight, cardboard, your little learner can stack them tall! 10 Cubes Nest Together for Optimum & Easy Storage Each cube can be nestled into one another for easy storage and cleanup! Letters & Numbers & Illustrations... Oh My! These colorful, interactive cubes features the alphabet, number, and corresponding illustrations for maximum learning fun.

Tactile & Motor, Mathematics, and Language Skills Build and enhance fine motor skills and basic math and language knowledge. The Learning Journey conducted extensive research of worldwide curriculum to determine the specific skills children need to develop during the various stages of their early lives. Extensive investigation revealed that the hundreds of specific skills identified fell into one or more defined categories. These categories were further developed and today make up The Learning Journey Skill Sets list. Look for these Skill Set icons on the back of The Learning Journey’s products. STEM Aligned Award-Winning Products STEM products are brain-boosting products that will give children hands-on experience with science, technology, engineering, and mathematics Play & Learn Stacking Cubes are a Hot Diggity Awards Winner! The Learning Journey continues to provide parents and teachers with award-winning tools to help children develop the skillsets needed to succeed in school. About The Learning Journey If you are looking for toys that both entertain AND help your children learn, then The Learning Journey is for you. The Learning Journey has spent the past 25 years designing and developing toys that are so much fun that kids won’t even realize they are learning. Not only do their exclusive line of interactive toys promote learning, they also encourage confidence as they enhance a child's potential. Check out all the great products from The Learning Journey right here at Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So we have reg stacking cups ans my son loves those but I wanted something a bit more learning involved....these boxes are perfect! The pictures are big enough and clear enough to see, as reg stacking cup numbers blend into the cup. He can count with them now and count the pictures that go with the numbers and we do colors and language skills finding pictures....it's just great. The stacking itself is more tough because it's harder to get the stacking down unlike the stacking cups that he can do in seconds....these are just boxes so they can slide off easier so it helps him take more time and think more and plus they are boxes....what kid doesn't have more fun with boxes! We play tossing games with them, hiding toys under them....the size of the tower is so great! I wish I had found these when my teenagers were little. My 23month old loves these....and they don't get lost like the stacking cups do all the time because they are so small. Only complaint is that I wish they were little bit stronger because of course kids step on toys so one box did bend a bit but thankfully is still usable and we have taught him not to do so lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the material and quality. Love the pictures on it. We love playing with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a toddler
reviews.reviewText: I really like these. They are card board so they might not last long but my 19 month old loves them, he has some motor delays and they are the perfect size for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Toy Cheaply Made
reviews.reviewText: In hindsight I wouldn't have got these. They are just cardboard nesting dolls honestly. They are cheap so expect a cheap product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I stack the tower my 15 month old grandson knocks down the tower. He gets a kick out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Buy for Blocks
reviews.reviewText: Bought a set for my house. The moms and kids loved them so much I bought them each a set. We went on vacation and everyone brought their set. That’s how much they love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cardboard is not toddler friendly
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are made of cardboard. Therefore they’re no longer intact. My toddler and other children managed to break a few of the blocks accidentally stepping/falling on them. The corners of the blocks began to warp from the blocks falling down.I guess it was good while it lasted but not worth the $$$ if they’re not even going to last for a month.Hard pass to any mommas with a child that isn’t gentle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and educational
reviews.reviewText: These building blocks are perfect for my almost 2 year old niece! She loves stacking them, and points to count each one! Sturdy and so colorful!
No se ve o no leí que es de cartón duro, hay que cuidar mucho de que no se vaya a mojar o que se apoye de más el bebe porque seguro se rompe a la primera.
